name: Aftershock
desc: Your heavy weapon creates chaos with every swing.
reqs: Technique is a _Strike_ using a _Versatile_/_Heavy_ Hafted Weapon_.
effect: Make the Target's space _Veiled_. On a _Graze_-, inflict _Exposed_ 1 (1 _Poise_).

name: Bold Strike
desc: You make a heroic strike, sacrificing your guard to inspire allies.
reqs: Attached to a Melee Strike.
effect: Gain _Exposed_ 1. On a _Hit_, gain _Vigor_ 2 and gain _Courage_ 1 or grant an ally within Range 6 _Courage_ 1. On a _Crit_, instead gain _Vigor_ 4 and gain _Courage_ 2 or grant an ally within Range 6 _Courage_ 2.

name: Bull Rush
desc: You bowl through foes, leaving them sprawling in your wake.
reqs: Must be Attached to a Technique with Movement and you are using _Ox Stance_.
effect: During this Technique, if you move into a creature's space, deal 2 Crush Damage and knock them _Prone_ (1 _Grit_/_Reflex_). If they _Negate_, they take half Damage. You may also attempt to move through Obstacles; when you do, use _Martial Arts_ using a Body Weapon against the Obstacle. Add _Siege_. If you fail to destroy the _Obstacle_, end your _Shift_. Otherwise, continue your _Shift_.
boost: 1 _Grit_, taken when you fail to destroy an _Obstacle_: Increase the Damage by 3. This Boost is repeatable.

name: Catapult
desc: You send a boulder upward, creating a deadly explosion when it lands.
effect: You must target a _Boulder_ or _Large Boulder_. Range is instead 6 and, if you use the Obstacle's Interact, halve all Costs.
boost:
Choose one, and use it in place of one of the Obstacle's Interact:
* 3 _Grit_/_Momentum_: Must target a _Boulder_. Remove the _Boulder_, then create a Blast 1 Hazard within Range 8. At the end of the _Round_, remove the _Hazard_, place a _Boulder_ in the center of the Area, and Attack using the below Profile.
* 4 _Grit_/_Momentum_: As above, but instead target a _Large Boulder_ and create a _Hazard_ that is a Burst 1 around a Size 2 Obstacle, including the spaces that the Obstacle would occupy. Deal +2 Damage and increase the cost to _Negate_ by 1.

Regardless, _Push_ any creature in the space the Obstacle is placed in so that it is not in an occupied space.

name: Concussive Smash
desc: Your attack slams down with titanic force, sending out shockwaves.
reqs: Technique is a Strike using a Melee Weapon.
effect: Repeat the Attack in a Burst 1 around the Target, exempting yourself, but add _Glancing_.
boost: 1 _Grit_: Make two spaces adjacent to the Target _Rough_.

name: Courageous Charge
desc: You dash forward recklessly, inspiring your allies with your display.
reqs: Attached to a Technique with Movement.
effect: For your turn, enemies have _Advantage_ on all _Opportune_ _Punish_ Attacks against you, but gain _Impaired_ 1 (1 _Poise_) if they do not take a _Punish_ Reaction against you when they are able to. Whenever an enemy makes a _Punish_ Attack against you either gain _Courage_ 1 or grant an ally within Range 4 _Courage_ 1, your choice.
boost: 2 _Grit_: Gain _Guard_ 2 for this Movement.

name: Crashing Earth
desc: You sacrifice speed to imbue a strike with every ounce of the earth's power.
reqs: Technique is a Strike using a Weapon.
effect: This Technique's Movement is now _None_, and you may not Move with any of your other Techniques or use _Reactions_ this _Phase_. Do not resolve this Technique until the end of the current _Phase_ but, as a part of this _Technique_, you may _Wager_ up to 3 _Grit_. If you do not lose, you have _Advantage_ on the Attack.

name: Disarming Throw
desc: You target a foe's weapon or equipment, attempting to remove it.
reqs: Technique is a _Strike_ using a _Thrown_ Weapon_.
effect: Resolve a single Attack with a _Thrown_ Weapon twice: once, adding _Glancing_, against the creature, and once, adding _Sundering_, against a piece of _Equipment_ the creature has _Equipped_. If both attacks are a _Hit_+, inflict _Exposed_/_Impaired_ 1 (1 _Poise_).
special: If the Target has no _Equipment_, instead add _Impaired_ 1 to the Attack.

name: Disruptive Bash
desc: Attacks with your shield leave foes reeling, limiting their ability to respond.
reqs: Must be Attached to a Strike using a Shield Weapon.
effect: On a _Graze_+, increase _Impaired_ inflicted by 1. You may exchange any Value of _Impaired_ you would inflict for _Dazed_ or _Vulnerable_ and instead inflict that _Affliction_. For example, you may, instead of inflicting _Impaired_ 3, inflict _Dazed_ 1, _Vulnerable_ 1, and _Impaired_ 1.

name: Driving Strikes
desc: Your blunt weapons forces foes back, keeping them off guard.
reqs: Technique is a Strike using a _Hafted_ Weapon and you are using _Bully Style_.
effect: Add _Push_ 1 on a _Graze_+, or _Push_ 2 on a _Hit_+. You may reduce the final _Push_ of the Attack by 4 to instead inflict _Prone_.

name: Earth Leap
desc: You are skilled at controlling earth, flinging it about with ease.
reqs: Technique has Movement.
effect: Create an Earth Block in your space. Immediately make a single Jump, increasing your Jump value by 2 for this Jump.
boost:
Choose any:
* 1 _Grit_: Make all spaces adjacent to where you end your Jump _Rough_/_Veiled_.
* 1 _Grit_: Instead, create an _Earth Pillar_. Increase your Jump value by 3 instead.

name: Exploiting Strike
desc: You find an old wound in an enemy with your seismic sense before exploiting it with a powerful attack.
reqs: Attached to a Single-Target Strike.
effect: On a _Hit_+ add _Impaired_ 1 to the Attack and increase the cost to _Negate_ by 1.
special: If you _Attack_ a foe within your _Seismic Sense_ and clear a _Insight_ Token as a part of this Attack, deal additional Damage equal to Value of _Insight_ cleared.

name: Fortifying Stone
desc: You tear stone away as you run, hastily constructing armor.
effect:
Inflict _Fragile_ on an adjacent _Earthen_ _Obstacle_ that does not already have _Fragile_, then choose one:
*  If you have 1 or less _Stone Armor_, gain _Stone Armor_ 1.
* Increase the _Durability_ of your _Stone Armor_ by 1 this _Round_.
boost: 1 _Grit_: You may use the first option regardless of the amount of _Stone Armor_ you have.

name: Fracture
desc: An obstacle within range detonates, sending a blast of stone shrapnel shredding through nearby enemies.
effect: Choose a Size 1 _Earthen_ Obstacle within Range. Attack with this Technique's Profile in an Area centered on the Target, then Destroy the Target. On a _Graze_+ deal X additional Damage, where X is half the Speed of the Obstacle. You may make the Area _Veiled_ for 2 Phases.
special: Deal an additional 1 additional Damage on a _Graze_+ if this Technique is used with a _Boulder_ or _Large Boulder_.
boost: 2 _Momentum_/_Grit_: You may choose a Size 2 _Earthen_ Obstacle. Increase the cost to _Negate_ by 1, and Area is Burst 2.

name: Gilgamesh Swing
desc: You swing an obstacle about, dealing heavy damage.
effect: Target a Size 1 Obstacle. Inflict _Push_ 2, _Prone_, and Damage equal to the Speed of the Obstacle (2 _Grit_/_Reflex_) in a _Burst_ 1 around you. If a Target negates with _Grit_, still inflict half Damage. If they _Negate_ with _Reflex_ they take no Damage, but are still _Pushed_. If the total damage dealt by this Technique (added up between all Targets) is greater than the _Obstacle's_ _Durability_, Destroy it. Otherwise, inflict _Fragile_ on it.
boost:
Choose one:
* 2 _Grit_/_Momentum_: Instead, target a Size 1 Obstacle with at least a Height of 2. Instead Attack in a Burst 2./n* 4 _Grit_/_Momentum_: Instead, target a Size 1 Obstacle with at least a Height of 3. Instead Attack in a Burst 3.

name: Herculean Throw
desc: With titanic strength you redecorate with deadly intent.
effect: You must Target a Size 1 _Obstacle_. Instead of using its normal _Interact_, move the Obstacle up to 4 spaces, then Attack a creature next to the Obstacle's final location using the _Heavy Improvised Weapon_ Profile. Add _Fragile_ to the _Obstacle_.
special: If the Target is at a lower Elevation than the Obstacle originally was you have _Advantage_ on this Attack.
boost: 2 _Grit_/_Momentum_: Instead, Attack in a Burst 1 around the end location of the Obstacle and _Destroy_ it.

name: Mighty Leap
desc: You draw upon the earth's strength, massively increasing your jumping power.
reqs: Technique has Movement.
effect: Increase your _Jump_ value by 2 this Turn. You may make a single _Jump_ this turn, and may make the space you start your _Jump_ from _Veiled_ until the end of the next _Phase_.
boost: 1 _Grit_: Increase your _Jump_ by an additional 1.

name: Mighty Strike
desc: You strike with unparalled strength, driving back a foe.
reqs: Technique is a Strike using a Weapon and you are using _Mighty Stance_.
effect: On a _Graze_+, deal +1 Damage, add _Push_ 2, and increase the cost to Negate by 1.
special: If the Weapon is _Heavy_, instead deal +2 Damage, add _Push_ 3, and increase the cost to Negate by 1.

name: Mobile Armor
desc: You are an expert at shifting your posture from mobility to defense.
effect:
Choose one:
* Decrease the _Speed_ of the _Technique_ by 1, but gain _Vulnerable_ 1.
* Increase the _Speed_ of the _Technique_ by 1, but add _Warding_ 2.

name: Mobile Bunker
desc: You run forward with your shield up, providing an ample defense.
reqs: Technique has _Movement_.
effect: You have _Cover_ and +1 _Guard_ this _Turn_.

name: Rapid Shot
desc: You quickly fire, sacrificing power for speed.
reqs: Technique is a Strike using a Projectile Weapon.
effect: Make three Attacks using your Weapon's Profile against the same Target. If all three are a _Hit_+, inflict _Bleed_ 1 (2 _Grit_).

name: Rebalancing Strike
desc: You readjust your stance on the fly, preparing for a different assault.
reqs: Technique allows making an Attack with an _Unarmed_ Weapon.
effect: Change your _Stance_/_Style_.
boost: 1 _Poise_/_Momentum_: Instead, clear _Staggered_ then change your _Stance_/_Style_.

name: Rouse
desc: Your courage fills you with the strength to carry on.
reqs: You are using _Defiant Stance_.
effect: At the end of your _Turn_, remove your topmost _Courage_ Token. Gain _Grit_ equal to its value or _Vigor_ equal to twice its value.

name: Sapping Strike
desc: Your weapon erode's a foe's ability to defend themself with every strike.
reqs: Technique is a Strike using a _Hafted_ Weapon.
effect: On a _Hit_, you may force the Target to discard 1 _Defense_ of your choice. On a _Crit_,  they instead discard 2. If they do not have sufficient Defensive Tokens they may discard other _Defensive Tokens_ of their choice. If they have no other _Defensive Tokens_, they instead take Damage equal to twice the Tokens they did not discard.

name: Seismic Aim
desc: You set your feet as you strike, reading your foe's every move.
reqs: _Attached_ to a Single-Target Strike.
effect: Ignore _Veiled_ Terrain for this Technique. If the Target is within your _Seismic Sense_, reduce any _Penalty_ by 1 and ignore _Cover_.
special: If the Target is within your _Seismic Sense_, you may remove the target's Topmost _Insight_ Token. Add _Pierce_ X-1/_Unblockable_ X/_Sure Hit_ X, where X is the Value of the Token.
boost: 1 _Poise_/_Momentum_: Instead of reducing any _Penalty_, ignore _Disadvantage_.

name: Severing Strike
desc: You outmaneuver a foe in an attempt to break their stance.
reqs: Technique allows making an Attack with an _Unarmed_ Weapon.
effect: Once this _Turn_, on a _Hit_+ with an _Unarmed_ Weapon, add _Staggered_ and increase the cost to _Negate_ by 1.

name: Skirmisher's Charge
desc: You slip along the battlefield, unable to be pinned down.
reqs: Technique has _Movement_.
effect: You may immediately Attack the first enemy to use an _Opportune_ _Punish_ _Reaction_ against you with a 1 AP Single-Target _Strike_, paying all Costs as normal.

name: Sledge
desc: Your weapon tears through an obstacle, surprising a foe.
reqs: Technique is a _Strike_ using a Hafted Weapon_.
effect: Once this _Turn_, before making an Attack with your Hafted Weapon, attack an _Obstacle_ adjacent to the _Target_ with your Hafted Weapon. If you _Destroy_ the _Obstacle_, gain a +1 Bonus to your _Attack Roll_. If you do not _Destroy_ it, instead take a -1 Penalty.
boost: 1 _Grit_/_Momentum_: Deal +2 Damage to the Obstacle. You may repeat this _Boost_.

name: Sling Stone
desc: Your spirit assists you in flinging a stone with massive force.
effect: You must target a _Boulder_ or _Large Boulder_. Range is instead 6 and, if you use the Obstacle's Interact, halve all Costs.
boost:
Choose one, and use it in place of one of the Obstacle's Interact:
* 2 _Grit_/_Momentum_: Must target a _Boulder_. Use either of the _Boulder_'s Interacts at no Cost, but instead _Push_ it 6 spaces. Deal +1 Damage and increase the _Push_ it inflicts by 2.
* 3 _Grit_/_Momentum_: As above, but instead target a _Large Boulder_.

name: Spear Vault
desc: You plant your spear, using it as a pole vault to amplify your jump.
reqs: Technique has Movement and you are Wielding a Pole Weapon.
effect: Increase your _Jump_ value by 1 + your Pole Weapon's _Reach_ this Turn for the first _Jump_ you make this Turn.

name: Spire Strike
desc: Your pull the earth up into jagged spikes.
effect: Make an unoccupied _Earthen_ space in Range 6 _Jagged_. Inflict _Bleed_ 1 on an adjacent creature (1 _Reflex_).
boost: 1 _Grit_: Instead, inflict _Hobbled_ 1 (2 _Reflex_).

name: Staggering Strike
desc: A heavy blow that is almost certain to delay a foe.
reqs: Technique allows making an Attack with an _Unarmed_ Weapon.
effect: Once this _Turn_, on a _Hit_+ with an _Unarmed_ Weapon, add _Slowed_, _Push_ 2, and increase the cost to Negate by 1.

name: Stone Eruption
desc: You run headlong into stone, detonating it with explosive force and charge forward in the stonescreen.
reqs: Technique has _Movement_ and you are using _Rubble Stance_.
effect: Once this _Movement_ you may deal 10 _Crush_ Damage to an _Earthen_ Obstacle. If you _Destroy_ it you may immediately _Step_ Move in any direction and deal 2 _Slash_ Damage to all adjacent creatures, excluding yourself. For the remainder of your _Turn_, other creatures treat you as _Veiled_.
boost: 1 _Grit_: Deal 4 additional Damage to the Obstacle.

name: Sundering Strike
desc: Your blow against a foe's defenses reverberates through them.
reqs: Technique is a Strike using a _Hafted_ Weapon.
effect: If this Attack targets a creature's _Armor_, inflict _Dazed_ 2/_Exposed_ 1 (2 _Poise_) on the creature on a _Hit_+.

name: Tumble
desc: You roll across the ground, slipping past foes.
reqs: Technique has Movement and you are using _Tumbler Style_.
effect: At any point in your Movement, you may declare that you are Tumbling. For the next X spaces, where X is your _Step_ value, add _Charge_, _Rush_, and _Safe_ 2 to your Movement.

name: Warding Bladed
desc: You sacrifice the power of your strike to slip into a defensive stance, preparing for the opponent's next blow.
reqs: Technique is a _Strike_ using a Bladed Weapon.
effect: Reduce the Damage of the Strike by 2, to a minimum of 1. Gain 1 _Grit_/_Reflex_ on a _Crit_.
special:
Gain an additional bonus, depending on the Strike's Keywords:
* _Quick_: Gain 1 _Reflex_. If the Weapon is _Light_, add _Safe_ 1.
* _Strong_: _Gain 1 _Grit_. Instead, only reduce the Damage by 1. If the Weapon is _Heavy_, instead do not reduce the Damage.
* Other: This Technique instead has _Warding_ 2. Gain 1 _Grit_/_Reflex_.
boost: 2 _Momentum_: Double the Tokens gained from the _Effect_. Add _Impaired_ 1 to a _Hit_ or _Impaired_ 2 to a _Crit_. Increase the cost to _Negate_ by 1.

name: Rising Wind
desc: You use the wind to launch yourself upwards/
reqs: Technique has Movement.
effect: You may make a single _Jump_ this Turn. Increase your _Jump_ by 1.

name: Armored Dodge
desc: You make use of your mobility and armor simultaneously, providing a flexible defense.
reqs: Must be wearing _Light Armor_.
trigger: You are Attacked.
effect: If you paid more _Grit_ than _Reflex_, gain 1 Guard against the Attack and reduce the _Grit_ cost to _Negate_ by 1. If you paid more _Reflex_ than _Grit_, reduce the Attack Roll by 1 and reduce the _Reflex_ cost to _Negate_ by 1. Otherwise, select either option.
boost:
Choose any:
* 2 _Grit_/_Momentum_: Repeat the _Grit_ effect. You may repeat this Boost.
* 2 _Momentum_/_Reflex_: Repeat the _Reflex_ effect. You may repeat this Boost.

name: Bladed Counter
desc: You expertly deflect with your blade and seize any opening.
reqs: Must be using _Guarded Edge Style_.
trigger: You are Attacked by a creature you targeted with _Guarded Edge Style_.
effect: Reduce the Attack Roll by 2. If this makes the Attack a _Graze_- you may inflict Damage on the creature as if you rolled a 7 so long as they are within Range of your Weapon.

name: Charge Killer
desc: As a foe enters the reach of your spear you let loose with a mighty attack.
reqs: Your _Reach_ is increased by _Set Spear_.
trigger: A creature enters your Pole's _Reach_.
effect: Use the _Armed Strike_ Technique, using your _Pole_ Weapon. On a _Graze_+, deal additional _Damage_ equal to your _Reach_.

name: Chip Damage
desc: When foes strike your armor vicious bits of shrapnel punish their efforts.
trigger: You take damage while you have _Stone Armor_ and are using _Colossus Stance_.
effect: Attack in a _Burst_ 1 with the following Profile.

name: Destructive Backswing
desc: Your swing of your blunt weapon is never truly over, allowing you to turn a miss into an advantage.
reqs: Must be using _Crusher Style_.
trigger: You _Graze_- with an Attack using a Hafted Weapon.
effect:
Move 1, then choose one:
* Repeat the Attack against an _Obstacle_ in Range.
* Inflict Vulnerable 2 (2 _Reflex_) on the original Target.
boost: 1 _Grit_/_Momentum_: Resolve both Effects.

name: Earthen Shield
desc: A wall of stone rises up, shielding you from an incoming assault.
trigger: You or an allied creature within Range 3 is Attacked with on _Earthen_ Terrain while you are using _Barricade Stance_.
effect: Grant the triggering creature _Cover_ and 1 _Guard_ against the triggering Attack. Then _Slide_ 1 the Triggering creature and put an _Earth Block_ in their space.

name: Evasion
desc: You dive out of the way of an incoming assault, lessening the impact.
reqs: Must have used _Quick Step_ this _Round_.
trigger: You are Attacked by a damaging Area Effect or _Hazard_.
effect: Resolve your Movement. If this Movement takes out out of the Area, treat the Attack as if it was _Glancing_ against you. Otherwise, reduce the Attack Roll by 1.
boost: 1 _Reflex_: You may instead take a _Reposition_ Move.

name: Heavy Guard
desc: You raise your guard temporarily, preparing for an assault.
reqs: Must be using _Guarded Style_.
trigger: A _Phase_ begins.
effect: Gain _Fortify_ 1 until the end of this _Phase_.

name: Hidden Flaw
desc: As a foe slams into an obstacle you subtly shift it, maximizing the harm.
trigger: A creature within an Area created by _Rippling View_ is forcibly moved into an _Obstacle_.
effect: The creature takes 2 _True_ Damage and gains _Dazed_ 2/_Bleed_ 1 (2 _Poise_/_Grit_).

name: Immovable Object
desc: You draw upon the strength of the earth, rendering you immovable for an instant.
reqs: You are using _Anchor Stance_.
trigger: You are Attacked.
effect: Gain _Slowed_. Immediately use _Deflect_, ignoring its usual _Cost_. If you would be _Pushed_, _Pulled_, or _Slid_, you are instead not.

name: Lightning Reflexes
desc: You flawlessly avoid a creature's attempt to punish you.
reqs: Must be using _Instinct Style_.
trigger: A creature would make an _Opportune_ _Punish_ Attack against you.
effect: Resolve the Attack by rolling only a single d6.
boost: 1 _Reflex_: Instead, Trigger is 'A creature would make a _Punish_ Attack against you.'

name: Lionheart Shield
desc: You become a shining example of courage, leaping in front of an attack that would harm a friend.
trigger: An adjacent ally is successfully Attacked while you are in _Bold Stance_.
effect: Move into the target's space, _Pushing_ them 1. You become the Target of the original Attack. If this was an Area attack your ally is only exempt if they are _Pushed_ out of the Area. Gain 1 _Courage_.
special: You may pay any amount of the Cost by expending an equivalent Value of _Courage_, using any Tokens.
boost:
Choose any:
* 1 _Reflex_: Trigger is instead 'An ally within Step distance is Attacked.'
* 1 _Grit_: You may _Push_ your ally an additional 1. You may use this _Boost_ multiple times.

name: Overwatch
desc: You hone in your aim on an area, preparing to loose on any that linger too long.
trigger: A creature within your Weapon Range ends their Turn in the Hazard created by _Overwatch Style_ or Moves into the Hazard.
effect: Make a 2 AP _Glancing_ _Armed Strike_ with a Projectile Weapon against the Triggering creature.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Remove _Glancing_.

name: Patient Guard
desc: Your counter is delayed, instead positioning yourself to exploit an opening.
reqs: Must be using _Warding Style_.
trigger: You are Attacked while wearing Light _Armor_.
effect: Increase the Attack Roll by 1. Gain 1 _Momentum_, and the opponent must either pay 1 _Poise_ or else you gain a +1 Bonus to your next Attack Roll against them.
boost: 1 _Poise_/_Momentum_: Instead, foe must pay 2 _Poise_ or else you gain a +1 Bonus and add _Sure Hit_/_Unblockable_ 2 to your next Attack Roll against them.

name: Perfect Counter
desc: You punish an opening, exploiting it as much as possible.
reqs: Must be using _Counter Style_.
trigger: You are Attacked while wearing Light _Armor_.
effect: Immediately Attack the triggering enemy with a 1 AP Single-Target Strike, paying all Costs as normal. Deal an additional 2 Damage on a _Graze_+.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Instead, use a 2 AP Strike.

name: Read the Pulse
desc: Your seismic sense reveals an upcoming attack, allowing you to take action before it lands.
trigger: You are Attacked by a creature within your _Seismic Sense_ while using _Pulsereader Stance_.
effect: You may immediately use the _Deflect_ or _Dodge_ Reaction. Pay all normal Costs, but you may use _Poise_ in place of _Reflex_ or _Grit_. If this causes the Attack to deal no _Damage_ or _Miss_, inflict _Insight_ 1 (1 _Poise_).

name: Sample Reaction
desc: A sample Reaction to outline the different fields.
move: If the Reaction provides any Movement, it goes here.
cost: What must be paid to use this Reaction.
reqs: What requirements you must fulfill to use this Reaction.
trigger: The triggering condition to use this Reaction.
effect: The primary effect of this Reaction.
boost: An optional effect with an associated cost that can be paid when the Reaction is used.

name: Severing Jab
desc: You lash out as another creature attempts to make use of spiritual techniques, potentially disrupting the ability.
trigger: An adjacent creature uses a _Spirit_ Technique.
effect: _Wager_ up to 3 _Poise_ against the Triggering creature. If you win, they take a Penalty equal to your _Wager_ on the Attack Roll. If you lose, gain _Exposed_ 1.

name: Skilled Sculptor
desc: You swiftly shape the ground around you, molding it like clay to better suit your purpose.
trigger: A _Phase_ begins while you are using _Sculptor Stance_.
effect: Repeat the Effect of _Sculptor Stance_.

name: Stone Block
desc: Your mighty shield of floating stone intercepts an attack, making it far easier to defend against.
trigger: A creature adjacent to one of the _Boulder_s created by _Stone Shield_ would be attacked.
effect: Grant the creature 2 _Fleeting_ _Grit_. You may choose to Destroy one of the _Boulders_ as a part of this Reaction to immediately grant the Target _Stone Armor_ 1 and one additional _Fleeting_ _Grit_.

name: Swift Punishment
desc: None near you are safe from your punishment.
reqs: Must have used _Defensive Posture_ this _Round_.
trigger: A creature enters a space within _Step_ Movement of you.
effect: Resolve this _Technique's_ Move. Immediately Attack the triggering creature with a 1 AP Single-Target Attack, paying all Costs as normal.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Instead, use a 2 AP Single-Target Strike.

name: Whirling Counter
desc: You absorb the momentum of an attack, using it to launch you to attack another.
reqs: Must be using _Skirmish Style_.
trigger: You are Attacked while wearing Light _Armor_.
effect: Increase the Attack Roll by 2. Use this Technique's _Move_, then immediately Attack any creature other than the Triggering Target with a 1 AP Single-Target Strike, paying all Costs as normal.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Instead, use a 2 AP Strike.
